attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ban the great british circus, the main reason is because they are using wild animals, eg tigers. And this is not a natural thing, these animals are trained to do the things they do in the circus and its appalling. They do 13 shows a week and it has to be stopped!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
